title: Zero-Copy UDP Stack
description: Design a high-throughput network coding transport using UDP, SharedArrayBuffer for zero-copy worker handoff, and MTU-aligned symbol sizing to eliminate OS fragmentation overhead and GC pressure.
author: Engineer

dialogue.note: Defined a unified three-pillar stack: SharedArrayBuffer for zero-copy handoff, MTU-aligned symbol sizing (1400B/8192B), and decoupled sliding window logic.
Architected a decoupled UDP stack with Zero-Copy Shared Memory, Wrapper-based impairment injection, and strict MTU alignment.
